item.title: Email sent to the Minister of Justice, Nicole Belloubet, to beg her to respond to me.
item.description: Date sent : March 19, 2018, at 22:07 (China Standard Time). Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-03-19-s-il-vous-plait-madame-belloubet.pdf SUBJECT: PLEASE MADAM Dear Minister, I sent you a request last week. I implore you, please give me an answer, even if it’s negative. But please say something. I understand that you must be very busy. You don’t need to respond to me personally. You can delegate this matter to someone else. But please have someone contact me by email quickly.
